text:
Send Parameter With the Request checkbox in the Web Test controller does not 
retain its checked state when the test plan is loaded.

Example:
Save a thread group with a Web Controller, that has "Send Parameter With the 
Request" checkbox checked, and has some name/value pairs assosicated.

Remove the THread group, then reopen.
The "Send Parameter With the Request" checkbox won't be checked.
creator: marcus.pecher@oracle.com

text: Doesn't seem to be relevant to current code.
creator: mstover1@apache.org
jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
